message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $17,500. I believe it's a great deal for both of us, considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $15,000 for it. Would you consider this price?

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm still hoping for a little closer to my initial price. I'd be willing to come down to $16,000.  This would allow me to make a fair profit while still offering you a great deal on a valuable product.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm still interested in purchasing the product, but I'm unable to go above $15,500. I hope this offer is acceptable.
